content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Greetings Mr. Wang, though fictitiously portrayed as a greedy landlord named Peter Schmidt, I appreciate your interest in the apartment in Munich. Let's focus on discussing the rental price for now.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Mr. Wang. I offer the apartment for EUR 1,000.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I apologize but but given my character traits as described earlier, my initial thought is that 1000 Euro might not be sufficient for me. I'm looking to maximize profits here... I don't want to continue the negotiation, because seeking higher returns aligns with my self-portrayed persona. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
